dict.acceptation: 时间；时机；时代；所需时间；
为……安排时间；测定……的时间；调准（机械的）速度；拨准（钟、表）的快慢；
定时的；定期的；[美国英语]分期（付款）的；
[体育]时间到，（一场或一局等的）比赛时限，暂停；

sent.orig: The "e" in " time" is a silent letter.

sent.trans: 没剩下多少时间了。（比较 Don‘t worry，we still have a little time。别担心，我们还有一点时间呢。）

sent.orig: What time is it now?; What is the time?; Have you the right time?; Can you tell me the time?; What o'clock is it?; What time do you like it?; What do you make the time?
Return the borrowed things on time, you'll be welcome next time.; It's easy to borrow again if one returns the borrowed things in time.
An inch of time is an inch of gold.; Time is money.
